VIII.iv.2.B.3.c
.
Record Group 407, the Philippines Archives Collection
Record Group 407
,
the Philippines Archives Collection in the Records of The Adjutant General's Office, 1917
, includes some records for the following camps and others:
Bilibid
Cabanatuan, and
O'Donnell.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
